item.title: Redux vs Mobx summary
item.description: I found great thread comparing and explaining reasoning behind usage of Redux and MobX so I highly recommend it if you want to know how these two relate and what are the pros and cons. BTW reading “discussion” or “question” threads on github is great way to expand knowledge about certain libraries/solution so I highly recommend it. Here are for example “question” threads sorted by most comments for MobX
